content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, glad to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the prime location of the apartment in the city center and its modern amenities, I hope to keep the rental price as low as possible. Let's start negotiating.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That's fine by me. I'm listening.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Initially thinking around 750 Euros per month, but willing to lower it for the right tenant.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That's too low for me. I'm looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I seek an affordable option.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
